item.title: Several codes needed! please help
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

[quote=“leetzone, post:2, topic:233873”]Place this method under any other method (void)

public void Startersmenu() { sendQuest("@red@ TitleinRedtext", 8144); //note clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("@red@Red text", 8145); sendQuest(".", 8147); sendQuest(".", 8148); sendQuest(".", 8149); sendQuest(".", 8150); sendQuest("@blu@ blue text", 8152); sendQuest("", 8153); sendQuest("@red@ Red text", 8154); sendQuest(".", 8155); sendQuest(".", 8156); sendQuest(".", 8157); sendQuest(".",8158); sendQuest(".",8159); sendQuest(".", 8160); sendQuest(".", 8161); sendQuest("@blu@ Is blue text :D", 8162); sendQuest(".", 8163); sendQuest(".", 8164); sendQuest(".", 8165); sendQuest(".", 8166); sendQuest(".", 8167); sendQuest(".", 8168); sendQuest(".", 8169); sendQuest(".", 8170); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }
Now make a command and put this in it

				Startersmenu();

not spoonfeeding you :-)[/quote]
You just did :|.

Read full topic
